titles.title: Fire Station Infrastructure Safety Act

To direct the Administrator of the Federal Emergency Management Agency, acting through the Administrator of the United States Fire Administration, to submit to Congress a report regarding the age and condition of fire stations in the United States.
Fire Station Infrastructure Safety Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology.

bill.summary:
Fire Station Infrastructure Safety Act
This bill directs the U.S. Fire Administration to submit to Congress a report regarding the age and condition of fire stations in the United States.
